Alias.name: xnum
Alias.script:
-- > x3 get fish blue -- You take a shimmering white fish scale from a blue silk bag. -- You take a shimmering white fish scale from a blue silk bag. -- You take a shimmering white fish scale from a blue silk bag.
local number = matches[2] local command = matches[3]
for i=1,number,1 do send(command, false) end
